events.name: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_label: South Africa issues blanket diplomatic immunity for August summit
events.wd_description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.
events.description: South Africa issued blanket diplomatic immunity to all leaders attending an August summit, potentially allowing Russian President Vladimir Putin to visit without fear of arrest on an ICC warrant.

events.name: BRICS summit details
events.wd_description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.
events.description: South Africa will host a summit of BRICS groups (Brazil, China, India, Russia, and South Africa) in August, with a planning meeting of foreign ministers expected to take place on Thursday.

events.name: Department of Foreign Affairs' statement
events.wd_description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.
events.description: The Department of Foreign Affairs backed the immunity, stating it is a standard conferment for all international conferences and summits held in South Africa and is not for specific individuals.

events.name: Zelensky to attend G7 summit in Japan
events.wd_label: Zelensky to attend G7 summit in Japan
events.wd_description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky will travel to Japan for the G7 summit, marking his first trip to Asia since the invasion of Ukraine. This move demonstrates confidence and Western solidarity.
events.description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky will travel to Japan for the G7 summit, marking his first trip to Asia since the invasion of Ukraine. This move demonstrates confidence and Western solidarity.

events.name: Importance of the trip
events.wd_description: The trip is seen as crucial for maintaining important alliances with other nations and defending Ukraine's interests.
events.description: The trip is seen as crucial for maintaining important alliances with other nations and defending Ukraine's interests.

events.name: G7 summit agenda
events.wd_description: The war in Ukraine is at the top of the agenda for the three-day G7 summit, where leaders from the world's wealthiest democracies are expected to support Ukraine.
events.description: The war in Ukraine is at the top of the agenda for the three-day G7 summit, where leaders from the world's wealthiest democracies are expected to support Ukraine.

events.name: Statement by Oleksii Danilov
events.wd_description: Oleksii Danilov, Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine, emphasized the importance of Zelensky's physical presence at the summit to defend Ukraine's interests and provide clear proposals and arguments.
events.description: Oleksii Danilov, Secretary of the National Security and Defense Council of Ukraine, emphasized the importance of Zelensky's physical presence at the summit to defend Ukraine's interests and provide clear proposals and arguments.

events.name: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_label: Russian air strikes on Idlib province, Syria
events.wd_description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.
events.description: At least nine people were reportedly killed after Russian air strikes on the rebel-held Idlib province in Syria. The United Nations expressed concerns about the hostilities in the province.

events.name: Casualties in Idlib
events.wd_description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.
events.description: Bombs dropped from warplanes killed nine people next to a market outside Jisr al-Shughour, and two others were killed in an air strike near Idlib city.

events.name: Monitoring group's statement
events.wd_description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.
events.description: The Syrian Observatory for Human Rights monitoring group termed the attack the deadliest Russian attack this year.

events.name: Russia's response
events.wd_description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.
events.description: Russia's military did not comment on the situation immediately. Their air campaign supporting the Syrian government has been crucial in turning the tide of the civil war.

events.name: Retaliation for attacks
events.wd_description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.
events.description: The strikes were said to be a retaliation for attacks that had killed civilians in government-held Hama and Latakia provinces.

events.name: GM and POSCO Future M's Ultium CAM joint venture expansion
events.wd_label: GM and POSCO Future M's Ultium CAM joint venture expansion
events.wd_description: General Motors and South Korean chemical company POSCO Future M announced the second phase of their Ultium CAM joint venture by investing over $1 billion in the North American market to increase CAM production capacity and integrate pCAM production.
events.description: General Motors and South Korean chemical company POSCO Future M announced the second phase of their Ultium CAM joint venture by investing over $1 billion in the North American market to increase CAM production capacity and integrate pCAM production.

events.name: Investment details
events.wd_description: The investment will increase CAM production capacity and integrate pCAM production into the Ultium CAM joint venture.
events.description: The investment will increase CAM production capacity and integrate pCAM production into the Ultium CAM joint venture.

events.name: Joint venture site
events.wd_description: A site for the joint venture CAM and pCAM complex will be announced at a later date.
events.description: A site for the joint venture CAM and pCAM complex will be announced at a later date.

events.name: GM's EV capacity plans
events.wd_description: GM plans to install 1 million units of annual EV capacity in North America by 2025, supported by four U.S. battery cell joint venture plants initially offering 160 GWh of capacity.
events.description: GM plans to install 1 million units of annual EV capacity in North America by 2025, supported by four U.S. battery cell joint venture plants initially offering 160 GWh of capacity.

events.name: Ultium CAM project's impact
events.wd_description: The Ultium CAM project is expected to support the production of roughly 360,000 Chevrolet, Cadillac, GMC, Buick, and BrightDrop vehicles each year in North America between 2025 and 2030.
events.description: The Ultium CAM project is expected to support the production of roughly 360,000 Chevrolet, Cadillac, GMC, Buick, and BrightDrop vehicles each year in North America between 2025 and 2030.

events.name: Statement from GM executive
events.wd_description: Doug Parks, GM’s executive vice president of Global Product Development, Purchasing and Supply Chain, emphasized the significance of increasing CAM production capacity and adding pCAM to the joint venture for building a secure and sustainable North America-focused supply chain.
events.description: Doug Parks, GM’s executive vice president of Global Product Development, Purchasing and Supply Chain, emphasized the significance of increasing CAM production capacity and adding pCAM to the joint venture for building a secure and sustainable North America-focused supply chain.

events.name: GM's battery manufacturing improvements
events.wd_description: GM has been working to improve battery manufacturing capabilities in North America, including teaming up with Samsung SDI to launch a new battery cell manufacturing plant in the U.S. by 2026.
events.description: GM has been working to improve battery manufacturing capabilities in North America, including teaming up with Samsung SDI to launch a new battery cell manufacturing plant in the U.S. by 2026.
